subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The talented and tenacious Drexel Dragons have defeated Temple, Villanova and St. Joe’s this season in addition to beating Syracuse, then ranked 23rd, on the road last month.
snippet: The talented and tenacious Drexel Dragons have defeated Temple, Villanova and St. Joe’s this season in addition to beating Syracuse, then ranked 23rd, on the road last month.
